title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
punchLines: 10 years of experience in Full-Stack development
Expertise in modern stacks: TypeScript, Node.js, React, Next.js
Complete project management from design to deployment
Experience as Scrum Master in an Agile environment
CI/CD pipeline implementation on all my projects
description: Experienced developer in web and mobile applications, specializing in TypeScript, Node.js, and React. My achievements include creating a booking platform with payment systems for LaPetitePouzerie.fr and implementing a search engine for video games on Gamewisher.com. Seeking a developer role at CoderPad, where I can bring my front-end and back-end development skills in an Agile environment to support your Tech team in strengthening your products and ensuring their growth.

experiences.title: Creation of a community platform dedicated to mobile games, managed independently.
tasks: Complete design of the platform with React and Next.js and the RESTful API with NestJS and MongoDB
CI/CD pipeline setup with Vitest and GitHub Actions and deployment in Docker containers

experiences.title: Complete design in TypeScript, NestJS, and NextJs of the booking site (in collaboration with a UX designer)
tasks: Requirements analysis with hosts to define functional rules.

experiences.title: Development of an Android app in React Native to manage lab lock openings (independently)
tasks: Requirements analysis: Weekly discussions and demos to define and develop MVP features.
Communication with the control box developer: Defining the Bluetooth communication protocol.

experiences.title: Development of an Android app in React Native for the Danish transport system (independently)
tasks: Requirements review in collaboration with a Danish Product Owner to define the software redesign
Cross-team collaboration establishing communication protocols with other bus equipment based on MQTT.

experiences.title: Development of a transport ticketing management system in Java and Angular (in a 10-person team)
tasks: Scrum master: Leading ceremonies, writing and reviewing User Stories
End-to-end feature design and implementation: PostgreSQL database changes, RabbitMQ message consumption, Angular user portals creation and API RESTful services

experiences.title: Development in C# and ASP.Net of the ticketing system for Auckland, NZ (in an 8-person team)
tasks: Bug fixing and performance improvement of components such as equipment fleet management, modifying both portal issues and database queries in Microsoft SQL Server

experiences.title: Technical migration of software in C# and WPF to a web version in ASP.Net (Master's Internship)
tasks: User interface improvement with graphical controls adapted to users' functional needs

formations.title: Expert in Software and Systems Development Engineering

skills.name: Autonomy and Ownership
skills.subtitle: Ensures code quality from design to delivery

skills.name: Collaboration and Agile Methodology
skills.subtitle: Serves as Scrum Master with varied profiles
